document_data.name: Lamellar
document_data.mainbody:
{{Wikipedia article|Lamellar armour}}
'''Lamellar''' was a type of armor used in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: Lamellar was similiar to [[scale armor]]. It was made by overlapping metal plates called lamellas connected via metal links.  Lamellar was lighter in weight than standard scale mail and cost less to produce. This armor was one of the more favored heavy armor variants in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Arabian Adventures|96}}
document_data.Variations: * '''Do-maru:''' A corselet of lamellar covering the stomach, chest, shoulders, and back.
